EmailTemplate.name: 99% to 90% or 75%
EmailTemplate.subject: ACTION REQUIRED: {!Opportunity.Name} Has Moved Down From 99%
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Opportunity.Name} has moved down from 99% because either:
- One or more fields are incorrect/incomplete. Please review the Closed Won Checklist - The file attached to the opp does not follow the naming convention. Please rename using the File Naming Convention
